content:
PageTheme Class

Definition

Represents the base class for a page theme, which is a collection of resources that are used to define a consistent look across pages and controls in a Web site. The page theme can be set through configuration or the page directive.

In this Article

[System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Advanced)]
public abstract class PageTheme
Inheritance
Object
PageTheme
Attributes
EditorBrowsableAttribute

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object, Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)
ToString()

Remarks

Page and control developers do not use the ControlSkinDelegate, ControlSkin, or PageTheme classes directly. These classes are used by the ASP.NET parser and runtime to apply style sheet elements that are defined in ASP.NET themes and control skins files to pages and specific types of controls.

Page developers enable (or disable) page themes using the Theme and EnableTheming properties. For more information about page themes, see ASP.NET Themes and Skins.

Constructors

PageTheme()

Initializes a new instance of the PageTheme class.

protected PageTheme ();
Attributes
EditorBrowsableAttribute

Properties

AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory

When overridden a derived class, gets the relative URL of the directory for the PageTheme object.

protected abstract string AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory { get; }
Value
String

A string value containing the relative URL of the PageTheme directory.

Attributes
EditorBrowsableAttribute

Remarks

The AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory property is abstract. When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides the AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory property. The ResolveUrl method uses the AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory property to resolves a relative URL to an absolute URL.

ControlSkins

When overridden in a derived class, gets an IDictionary interface of the names of all default skins that are available for the current page theme, indexed by control type.

protected abstract System.Collections.IDictionary ControlSkins { get; }
Value
IDictionary

An IDictionary that represents the control skins associated with the current page theme.

Attributes
EditorBrowsableAttribute

Remarks

The ControlSkins property is abstract. When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides this property.

LinkedStyleSheets

When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of style sheets that are linked to this page.

protected abstract string[] LinkedStyleSheets { get; }
Value
String[]

A string array of style sheets linked to this page.

Attributes
EditorBrowsableAttribute

Remarks

The LinkedStyleSheets property is abstract and must be implemented in a derived class. When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides this property.

Page

Gets the Page object that is associated with the instance of the PageTheme class.

protected System.Web.UI.Page Page { get; }
Value
Page

The Page associated with the PageTheme.

Attributes
EditorBrowsableAttribute

Remarks

The Page property is read-only and is assigned internally when an instance of the PageTheme class is created.

Methods

CreateSkinKey(Type, String)

Creates a lookup key object for a particular control type and skin ID.

public static object CreateSkinKey (Type controlType, string skinID);
Parameters
controlType
Type

The Type of control to which a control skin applies, which is passed typically from the stem.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ControlType*.

skinID
String

The name of the control skin for which to create a key.

Returns
Object

An object that can be used as a lookup key in a dictionary-style collection, which contains the control type and skin ID information.

Attributes
EditorBrowsableAttribute
Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

controlType is null.

Eval(String)

Uses the stem.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval(System.Object,System.String) method of the stem.Web.UI.PageTheme.Page* property that the instance of the PageTheme class is associated with to evaluate a data-binding expression.

protected object Eval (string expression);
Parameters
expression
String

The navigation path from the container to the public property value. For details, see DataBinder.

Returns
Object

An object that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression.

Attributes
EditorBrowsableAttribute

Remarks

The Eval method uses the GetDataItem method to resolve the data item container.

Eval(String, String)

Uses the stem.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval(System.Object,System.String,System.String) method of the stem.Web.UI.PageTheme.Page* property that the instance of the PageTheme class is associated with to evaluate a data-binding expression.

protected string Eval (string expression, string format);
Parameters
expression
String

The navigation path from the container to the public property value. For details, see DataBinder.

format
String

A .NET Framework format string. For details, see DataBinder.

Returns
String

A string that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression and conversion to a string type.

Attributes
EditorBrowsableAttribute

Remarks

The Eval method uses the GetDataItem method to resolve the data item container.

TestDeviceFilter(String)

Tests whether a device filter applies to the Page control that the instance of the PageTheme class is associated with.

public bool TestDeviceFilter (string deviceFilterName);
Parameters
deviceFilterName
String

The string name of the device filter to check.

Returns
Boolean

true if deviceFilterName applies to the page; otherwise; false.

Attributes
EditorBrowsableAttribute

XPath(String)

Evaluates an XPath data-binding expression.

protected object XPath (string xPathExpression);
Parameters
xPathExpression
String

The XPath expression to evaluate. For details, see XPathBinder.

Returns
Object

An object that results from the evaluation of the data-binding xPathExpression.

Attributes
EditorBrowsableAttribute

Remarks

The XPath method uses the GetDataItem method to resolve the IXPathNavigable object reference that the expression is evaluated against.

XPath(String, String)

Evaluates an XPath data-binding expression using the specified format string to display the result.

protected string XPath (string xPathExpression, string format);
Parameters
xPathExpression
String

The XPath expression to evaluate. For details, see XPathBinder.

format
String

A .NET Framework format string to apply to the result.

Returns
String

A string that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression and conversion to a string type.

Attributes
EditorBrowsableAttribute

Remarks

The XPath method uses the GetDataItem method to resolve the IXPathNavigable object reference that the expression is evaluated against.

An object that results from the evaluation of the data-binding xPathExpression.

Remarks

resolver

Evaluates an XPath data-binding expression and returns a node collection that implements the IEnumerable interface.

xPathExpression
